trends: There have been no other sightings in Grafton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were leaving the 4th of July celebration at Grafton Ponds with several friends. We looked up at the sky and noticed a round object flying overhead. The object was surrounded by orange lights that seemed to flash around the perimeter of the object. We were all enthralled by its appearance and watched it until we could no longer see it.
